name: Your Quarters
description: You awaken in your small, familiar cabin.
The hum of life support fills the air. Dim lights flicker on automatically.
Your bunk is unmade. Personal effects are scattered — reminders of a life spent in the black.
A hatch **leads forward to the galley**, humming faintly with activity.

name: Galley
description: A cramped kitchen area. Food synthesizer, water recycler, small table bolted to the floor.
Everything is functional, nothing is luxurious.
A hatch **leads back to crew quarters** — your bunk calls.
